participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and laid-back, enjoys casual conversations and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: i like to take walks. i live in a house. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i don't drink soda.

participant_2.background: i've a pet cow. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i work my parents farms.

content.text: Good, just got back from walking my dog.
